jump_scares.spoiler: A teenage boy turns around and a machete blade is driven into his head
Syl trips on a rubbish bin
After switching the lights back on, Syl turns around and a masked person is standing behind her
Syl turns and sees another masked figure in front of her
Sadie clobbers Big Al with a baseball bat as he talks to McKayla
The scene cuts away from Sadie and Jordan back to the gym (as an ominous sound effect plays)
The camera cuts back to Mrs. Kent and Lowell is now standing behind her
